text: Yad takaw kɨles apin, God ne gos anɨb okok yɨp ñek, mɨj awl kɨl tɨkɨl agñɨbin ak nepɨm okok, nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb apin.22.18-19 Lo 4.2, 12.32 Binɨb an takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, takaw ogɨnap sek jɨmñɨl agenɨgab, God ne bɨ anɨb anop pen tap tɨmel ogɨnap sek gek palsek amnɨgab. Tap tɨmel yɨbɨl gup ak mɨj anɨb ak tɨkɨpin okok, God ne tap tɨmel yɨbɨl anɨb okok bɨ anɨb anop pen gek palsek amnɨgab.
